Reviews.Title: Great Pics Poor Wifi
Reviews.Author: Suzanne V. Carey "Suzanna"
Reviews.Content: Not so easy to use WiFi; terrific pictures.  Not worth the extras; cheap.  Buy your card separately and pay less for the camera next time.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camara
Reviews.Author: sandy bee "san"
Reviews.Content: Iam enjoying my camera very wonderfull picture quality very nice zoom easy to fit in my  purse love it thanks

Reviews.Title: I LIKE IT
Reviews.Author: maricel
Reviews.Content: I like this camera its easy to  use and the quality of the picture is good.Actually i bought 7 of this product because when my friend saw it and try and i told them that its with wifi and they realy like it i will definitely recommend this product ...

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2MP CCD Image Sensor - ISO 100 to 12800
3.0" 230k-Dot LCD - Wi-Fi Direct, Email
25-125mm f/2.5 5x Optical Zoom Lens - 2D Panorama, Smart Auto, Smart Movie
Capture HD 720/30p Video - Face, Blink and Smile Detection
Direct LINK, Mobile Link, Remote VF - microSD/microSDHC Memory Card Slot
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST150F 16.2MP w/ WiFi Ready Smart Compact Digital Camera in White + 8GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
